panels.description: Actively syncing clients i.e the connection hasn't expired yet.
panels.title: # active sliding sync connections

panels.description: The number of devices blocked on an initial v2 sync. This number should never remain >0 for more than 15 minutes, unless there is a flood of new users to the system.
panels.title: EnsurePolling calls outstanding

panels.description: Excludes time waiting for live updates. Excludes initial requests.
panels.title: API processing time quantiles

panels.description: Requests take more that 50s. This is our best proxy for "how many people's requests are wedged". Should be a flat 0.
panels.title: Slow requests

panels.description: If this goes high, it may indicate poor DB performance when querying.
panels.title: Time taken to process initial sliding sync requests

panels.description: Excludes live streaming blocks. If this goes high, it may indicate poor DB performance when querying.
panels.title: Time taken to process changes (ranges/filter/sorting/etc) in sliding sync requests

panels.description: Number of /sync connections to upstream homeserver. Generally always goes up, unless users log out and invalidate the access_token being used.
panels.title: # v2 pollers

panels.description: The higher this is, the bigger the latency from sending events -> receiving events. Excludes initial /sync requests
panels.title: Time taken to process sync v2 responses

panels.description: If this drops too low, this means pollers are blocked on something (DB conns, executor, etc)
panels.title: Ratio of pollers waiting for v2 response

panels.description: If this number drops to 0, this indicates something is blocking all pollers from doing work. This number will scale with the number of pollers on the process.
panels.title: Rate of poll loop iterations

panels.description:
NB: Proxy requests a timeline limit of 50.

TODO: make it clear how many syncs were limited
panels.title: Timeline size of unlimited pollers

panels.description: Updates from v2 pollers sent to pubsub. Abnormal spikes could be from spam or lack of duplicate suppression in the proxy.
panels.title: Payload Rate

panels.description: Excludes time waiting for v2 sync requests. Excludes initial polls.
panels.title: Poller processing time quantiles

list.description: Window to use for aggregating buckets/moving averages
list.label: Window size
list.name: window_size
